attributes.action: Create a law that if a vehicle is holding up more than 10 vehicles on an single lane road, it must pull over to allow them to pass at the first safe opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many dangerous situations are caused when long lines of traffic gather behind a slow moving vehicle on an A of B road.  People try to overtake 1 or all the vehicles causing accidents.
For whatever reason they are slow, tractor, caravan, lorry, bad driver etc.  They should be legally required to pull over once they are holding up a certain amount.  Around 10 I'd say!
Anyone with me?
